subject: Business
title: Blue Ocean Strategy
description: A quick, practical guide to Blue Ocean Strategy.

hook.text: Cirque du Soleil didn't compete with other circuses. It created an entirely new market space.

buildup.text: Blue ocean strategy means creating uncontested market space instead of fighting in bloody red oceans.

discovery.text: Red oceans are crowded markets where everyone competes on the same dimensions. Blue oceans redefine the game.

twist.text: Blue oceans don't stay blue forever. Success attracts imitators who turn any blue ocean red over time.

climax.text: Nintendo Wii targeted non-gamers with motion controls while Sony and Microsoft fought over hardcore gamers.

punchline.text: Stop competing where everyone else is. Compete where nobody is.

quiz.question: What is a 'blue ocean' in business strategy?
options: An uncontested market space with no direct competition
A market dominated by a single company
A market that is shrinking rapidly
